title: Winter's Scars: The Forsaken
description: Defined by fateAccused of betrayalScarred by fire~~~~~~~~~~~~Not all metamorphoses are for the better. Sometimes nature can be cruel. Evan Winter was the youngest in the family. He was the academic-minded, medical genius who could perform intricate surgical procedures if necessary. He was the logic-driven, golden-hearted kid-brother of Meg and Alik. Everyone loved Evan. Everyone appreciated his devotion to family and his unconditional faith. No one could have seen his change coming. Nothing could have stopped the events as they unfolded. Now everybody is in shock at what has become of Evan Winter.
author: Karen Luellen
